roleset.name: to set free
roleset.note: LIBERATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'liberate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from liberate.01-v predicate notes)
LIBERATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, liberate.01. Corresponds to VNcls free-80, steal-10.5. (from liberation.01-n)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: In fact , he liberated the U.S. from one of the world 's most corrupt organizations -- UNESCO .
example.arg: from one of the world 's most corrupt organizations -- UNESCO

example.name: arg1
example.text: - The First Gulf War -LRB- liberation of Kuwait -RRB-

example.name: arg2 animate
example.text: Grateful Libyan people thank Britain for their liberation from Gadaffi.

example.name: arg2 inanimate
example.text: Jewish prisoners at the moment of their liberation from a death train near the Elbe.
example.arg: from a death train near the Elbe
